repo.name: devise_token_auth
repo.description: Token based authentication for Rails JSON APIs. Designed to work with jToker and ng-token-auth.

repo.name: letter_opener
repo.description: Preview mail in the browser instead of sending.

repo.name: grit
repo.description: **Grit is no longer maintained. Check out libgit2/rugged.** Grit gives you object oriented read/write access to Git repositories via Ruby.

repo.name: rails-i18n
repo.description: Repository for collecting Locale data for Ruby on Rails I18n as well as other interesting, Rails related I18n stuff

repo.name: rubocop-disable_syntax
repo.description: A RuboCop plugin that allows to disable some unfavorite ruby syntax, such as `unless`, safe navigation etc.

repo.name: FxLifeSheet
repo.description: Tracking the key metrics of my life

repo.name: chartkick
repo.description: Create beautiful JavaScript charts with one line of Ruby
